snippet.title: Churchgoers - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1067390/Churchgoers/
Check it out on Itch.io: https://team-noiz.itch.io/churchgoers
-----
Churchgoers is a stylized turn-based RPG where it's never your turn. Interact with characters, gain powers in the form of prayers, resist the overwhelming power of the spiritual and avenge your sister who was murdered by the Priest of Ash.
-----
https://www.school-of-the-west.com/
© 2019 Bells that End
© 2019 Team Noiz
